description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. Embolden yourself to the mystery of the Winds. Take control of a lonely father discovering the paranoia behind a town that seems so mysterious and dangerous that only a genius could understand it. When the Winds call, you absolutely must follow.
